full_summary:
**Title**
Tender for Acquisition of Metal Lockers with Digital Lockers for the Canadian Space Agency

**Tender Reference Number**
WS4128541276-Doc4158995608

**Publication Date**
31 October 2023

**Closing Date**
28 November 2023 at 2:00 PM EST

**Notice Type**
Request for Proposal

**Procurement Category**
Goods - Competitive

**Selection Criteria**
Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity**
Quebec, except the National Capital Region

**Contracting Entity Details**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity Details**

* Canadian Space Agency (CSA)
* 6767 Route de l'Aéroport, Saint-Hubert, Quebec, J3Y 8Y9, Canada

**Contact Information**

* Julien, Lisa-Marie (SPAC/PSPC)
* Phone: [Not available]
* Email: [lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Electronic Availability of RFP**

You may view the RFP document at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17876500?extsite=MTc4NzY1MDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Description**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSCP) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) to acquire twenty-one (21) two (2) level triple door metal lockers with digital locks for the Canadian Space Agency. For further information about the requirements, please refer to the Statement of Requirement in Annex [Insert Annex Reference Number].

Please note that the RFP closing date is 28 November 2023 at 2:00 PM EST. Late submissions will not be accepted.

Government Documents Notice IDaltetativity of Interest
